about_the_game:
Pixel Starships 2; the sequel to the popular Pixel Starships game is currently in development.

Pixel Starships is a starship building and battle game inspired by FTL, Eve online, and Final Fantasy.

Pixel Starships 2 builds upon the same goals as Pixel Starships. To create the ultimate ship builder and sci-fi strategy game. Featuring community engagement, advanced AI, detailed planning, micro-management, and complex battle tactics.

PSS2 will feature a fully 3D environment presented in a familiar 2D perspective. The new game engine is designed to add additional gameplay tactics. PSS2 will make some highly demanded but previously impossible PSS1 features a reality.

We will continue to post development updates on the steam page and forums. Please add the game to your wishlist to receive upcoming updates.

Key Features -

● Build Epic Starships of your own design.

● Many races, aliens, factions to command and conquer.

● Battle it out with other real players in a single massive online universe.

● Manage diplomacy, recruitment, research, exploration!

● Control ship's power and limited resources. Discover epic weapons.

● Build and deploy support crafts to augment your Starship.

● Cross-section full ship control and battles.

● Explore planets, discover the secrets of space.

● Form alliances and battle with your friends to achieve victory!

● Program situational AI commands for subsystems and crew. Allowing automatic combats and offline play. (from ship level 4 after building command room)
